targets.expr: (mtik_exporter_connection_stats{routerboard_name="JP-RB5009"}) * on (src_address) group_right(src_address, dst_addresses) (label_replace(mtik_exporter_dhcp_lease_info{routerboard_name="JP-RB5009"}, "src_address", "$1", "address", "(.*)")) or on (src_address, dst_addresses) mtik_exporter_connection_stats{routerboard_name="JP-RB5009"}
